name: Converted Drone Bays
desc:
Converts all fighter bays exclusively for drone usage.

Decreases the minimum crew required by %s per bay, decreases rearm time by %s and ordnance point cost of drone LPCs by %s.

Can not be installed on frigates or phase ships.
short: Conversion to drone-only automated fighter bays.

name: Improved Manufactory
desc: Upgrades the onboard manufactory to produce fighters that are %s faster, take %s less armor, %s less shield and %s less hull damage. Also increases maintenance cost by %s monthly.

name: Rime Original Paintjob
desc: Repaints the Racer init Luxurious Bronze scheme.

name: Rime Red Paintjob
desc: Repaints the Racer red with white stripes.

name: Rime Orange Paintjob
desc: Repaints the Racer orange and white.

name: Rime Rosenritter Paintjob
desc: Repaints the Racer into white and red Rosenritter sheme.

name: Rime Journey Paintjob
desc: Repaints the Racer into blue and grey Journey shceme.
